name: Rental unit in Singapore · ★4.31 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 0 baths
description:
A basic simple small room for solo traveler in a heart of Singapore's central area- with easy access to buses and MRT train- Located in a heritage district.

The space
Experience staying in Singapore's Straits Peranakan conserved unit with modern amenities.

The unit is part of a 3-storeys shop-house and an exclusive 33 - boutique apartment complex, with separate different units. This is the ground floor with a front porch and a backyard. The land title was from the British Colonial's 19th century (1841) of 999 years, and the original building was built before the World War. It has been renovated and retrofitted in 2011 with modern amenities while keeping the outside preserved.

It is suitable for a solo traveler, single traveler whom needs place to crash after exploring Singapore, or transiting to other destination.

Please note this is a small study place converted to guest room. Amenities in the room:
- This is a bright study

description:
Our premier suite is a lovely large room with high ceilings and your own private bathroom suite with bath and large walk in shower.

The space
Eclectic mix of modern art, contemporary and antique furniture are the foundation of this delightful large suite. High ceilings with fans, aircon and lots of light. Encapsulated in a 1925 traditionally built Singaporean shophouse, this is 1 half of a 2 bedroom apartment.

Guest access
Guests will have access to their own bedroom suite including shower facilities. In addition you have access to a shared living room with kitchenette.

During your stay
My wife and I operate Rabbit Carrot Gun and The Trenchard Arms and are on site a great deal of the time. We are therefore available to assist with most enquiries and have a great team who can help in our absence.

Other things to note
You can come by Taxi or MRT (Metro).
By taxi cost about $25 and the trip is about 20 mins.
By MRT the cost is $2.50 and 45 mins.
Depending on what time you arrive, without dragging any large luggage hopefully, I suggest MRT because it's cheaper, save you money and provide a sight- seeing tour on the elevated track before arriving at Chinatown MRT.
Backpack and travelling light is the best as most essential are already provided in your room.
If you are coming by MRT, board the MRT at Terminal 2 or 3 and you can easily figure out how to reach here. There are plenty of signboard prominently displayed at the stations.
Best bet is changed at Bugis MRT station.

请客人在预订前先向屋主咨询屋源可能性，切勿闪订。更欢迎长租客人入住，谢谢。

For couples or families with children, you may want to look at our twin bed capsule rooms. Our dormitory bed all comes with power socket and a locker. There is a complimentary daily breakfast. For beer lovers, be sure to try out our Gap Year Beer!

name: Rental unit in Singapore · ★4.56 · 1 bedroom · 1 shared bath
description:
A peaceful and tranquil area with million dollar view of lush tropical forest. Be greeted with live orchestra from chirpy morning birds and therapeutic insect calls at night. It is especially magical when the full moon hangs on top of the forest canopy. Interior decor is an elegant neoclassical fusion; a mix of rosewood furniture, Chinese antiques and modern Western collectibles. Kitchen is in a fun & retro style. I also have a private jungalow cafe with display of plants and more collectibles.

The space

My home is a privately owned 5- bedded apartment. There are 1 living, 1 dining, 2 bedrooms, 1 sun room, 2 toilets, 1 kitchen, 1 pantry and 1 laundry area.

Total Size: 1,150 sqft

What's most unique is the sun

description:
The space
Located at the crossroads of Ethnic Little India the Arab Street, the China Town and famous shopping belt of Orchard Road. The hotel offers comforts at a fraction of money compared to big brand hotels. The hotel is easily accessible by bus, car, taxi and train - 10-minute walk from Bugis MRT Station and Parco Bugis Junction Mall. Its central location enables hotel guests to move around the city with ease and comfort. Dunlop street is a happening place.Targeted at savvy singles, couples & families who want to walk and talk the Singapore experience A range of international cuisine eating joints , music lounges, arcades, beauty, massage parlors and many famous shopping centers are walking distance away.

A cosy and comfortable place to stay!

name: Rental unit in Singapore · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 4 shared baths
description:
Min stay 90 days (URA legal compliant).
Emerald Hill is a conservation site located in the heart of the lion city. A former home to many members of the city-state's wealthy Peranakan community, many of its homes feature skillfully preserved Chinese Baroque architecture. A quaint little street just minutes away from Orchard Road, it serves as an interesting glimpse into Singapore's history right in the middle of the city’s largest shopping district.

The space
The humble abode maintains its historic Peranakan flavour with its cool green exterior, while holding true to a classic elegance throughout its interior. Newly renovated on March 2018, the impeccably clean and spacious room features a Queen Sized bed, a work table, fresh linens, towels and toiletries, all fully provided for. Also stocked with all the cookware, dishware, kitchen towels, and condiments, our kitchen is ready for you to whip up budget friendly meals when you are not out enjoying our fine loc

Popular points of interests that are within walking distance from the property include Singapore Art Museum, MINT Museum of Toys. With plenty of nearby bus routes and MRT stations such as Bras Basah, Raffles City and Esplanade.

name: Hostel in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 3 shared baths
description:
Quarters Hostel is designed with YOU in mind - plush pillows, duvet blankets, full aircon, international plug, Free Wifi & breakfast. Plus friendly staff & AWESOME location - Chinatown, Singapore River, night life, 2 train stations all within 10mins!

The space
We believe that Quarters is more than just spending a night on an affordable bed. It entails a warm fuzzy environment where people meet people – friendships are forged, lovers are made, relationships engaged and inspired. So… we’ve done the basics of comfy beds, friendly staffs, useful facilities, and an awesome location for Quarters… now all that’s lacking, really, is you!

Guest access
Shared bathrooms, common lounge area and a Mac computer are available for guest use.

Other things to note
We sincerely apologise that we are unable to accommodate kids.

name: Hotel in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 4 beds · 8.5 shared baths
description:
The space
Want to have a deep and refreshing night’s sleep? CUBE Hotels feature a collection of comfortable capsules in shared or private rooms, each a cosy cocoon hidden from the outside world. Each capsule is designed with meticulous attention to detail. Our mattresses are super thick, and the linens are snuggly soft and plush. Not only are there several vital features available right inside your capsule, such as in-built universal plugs, and USB charger ports, but we’ve also added lights that dim, soundproofing, and air vents inside to create the ideal temperature. Come to CUBE for a sleep experience like none other.

Other things to note
Please take note: this is a private room and you will NOT be sharing it with other travelers. However, bathrooms are shared in this property.

A spacious 1 bedroom apartment unit located in a converted shophouse along a quiet street, just minutes walk from the bustle of Orchard Road and Little India. The space is filled with natural light in the day, with a comfy day bed that's perfect for lounging and reading. The bedroom is cool and quiet, set back from the main road. Cool off during the hot tropical afternoons in the small pool in the courtyard, and walk down to the corner coffeeshop for a snack of curry puffs.

The space
Set in a restored pre-war shophouse, this apartment unit features a large sun lit living room and pantry area, perfect for lounging about. The bedroom is set to the back, away from the street noise of the main road, and the bathroom and outdoor kitchen area overlook the pool. The apartment has beautiful hardwood floors, high ceilings with exposed beams and plenty of character.

Guest access

description:
Surrounded by an array of entertainment opportunities, our hostel is an ideal choice for budget travelers. Popular spots such as Kallang Wave Mall, Singapore National Stadium, Leisure Park Kallang and Kallang Riverside Park are easily reachable from the property, while nearby MRT stations like Kallang (only a 3-minute walk away), Aljunied and Paya Lebar provide guests with convenient connections to City Hall, Raffles Place, Orchard Road and other iconic areas spread across the Lion City.

The space

Our guests get to enjoy free Wi-Fi connection, TV, air condition, mineral water, as well as a toiletries kit in the bathrooms. description:
The space
Want to have a deep and refreshing night’s sleep? CUBE Hotels feature a collection of comfortable capsules in shared or private rooms, each a cosy cocoon hidden from the outside world. Each capsule is designed with meticulous attention to detail. Our mattresses are super thick, and the linens are snuggly soft and plush. Not only are there several vital features available right inside your capsule, such as in-built universal plugs, and USB charger ports, but we’ve also added lights that dim, soundproofing, and air vents inside to create the ideal temperature. Come to CUBE for a sleep experience like none other.

Other things to note
Please take note: some of the capsules are shared (depending which type of beds you booked) and you will be sharing your room with other travellers. name: Boutique hotel in * · ★4.50 · 1 bedroom · 2 beds · 1 private bath
description:
The space
Fitted with plush mattresses and linen, each capsule room is well designed to moderate its own temperature and air-flow; and solidly insulated to reduce ambient noise for a comfortable rest. Each capsule bunk is equipped with a universal electrical outlet protected with childproof adapter, room safe, mirror/vanity area, foldable table, bedside light and footwear storage. Each bunk bed is equipped with 32” smart TV sets with Netflix accessible to guests using their own passwords. There is ample storage space and a dressing table with mirror. Mini fridges with tea/coffee making facilities and bottled water are available. Sharp corners are considerately avoided for child safety while safety nets playfully surround the upper bunk.

name: Condo in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:

The unit is fully furnished and serviced giving you the convenience and ease of staying in a hotel as well as unmatched comfort that is only present in one's own home. You can also enjoy property facilities such as the gym and swimming pool.

The space
This 1 bedroom apartment covers an area of 614 square feet or 57 sqm, making it an ideal option for individual travelers and couples as it provides enough space to move about.

The unit comes with a living area that also has a work desk for easy remote working, a bedrooms with a king bed and a well-equipped kitchen featuring gas stoves, cooking utensils, a refrigerator, microwave and an electric kettle. The en-suite bathroom is the sole bathroom in the apartment, providing more privacy to you.

You also get a private balcony to enjoy the views of the city and get some fresh air.

name: Hostel in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 3 baths
description:
​Beary Best! Kampong Glam is a boutique capsule hostel, perfectly situated along the most historically significant Arab street, for you to immerse yourself in the cultural experience Kampong Glam has to offer!

Carefully restored from an art deco heritage building, we offer a calm, laid back and friendly environment.

Other things to note
Payment
* Payment by Credit Card or PayPal payments incur a 5% processing fee.
* A refundable security deposit of SGD 20 or equivalent in accepted foreign currencies per person is to be collected upon check-in, and returned upon an incident-free check-out.

Children policy
* Guest below 13 years old are not allowed at Beary Best! Kampong Glam Hostel.
* If you are traveling with children, please contact us as we have other accommodations more suitable for children.

name: Hostel in Singapore · ★4.50 · 1 bedroom · 8 beds · 3 shared baths
description:
BEAT. Sports Hostel is a one of its kind sports-themed concept hostel with an in-house gym, a swimming pool in our backyard, and a dope basketball machine. The Capsule Family Room is unique because most capsules in Singapore are in huge non-private rooms. Here you can experience the capsules in a private room. Next to fun, we have a great love for food! And Jalan Besar is a food paradise - Swee Choon Dimsum, Tiramisu Hero, Chye Seng Huat, just to name a few.

The space
We are essentially a Backpackers Hostel, but we offer private rooms so that you can have the best of both worlds. So come, expecting to meet and interact with people, and yes our lounge can be used both as a place to relax, and to play some sports - it's free for our guests. (:

name: Rental unit in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
description:
Swoop into Singapore’s alluring “Bohemian” enclave right in the heart of Holland Village. A hot spot for expatriates around the world, our modernly designed apartments, situated just beside Holland Village MRT and major bus-stops, features amenities that allow you to sit back, relax and take a breather. Term of Stay - 90 Days

The space
Minimum 90 days stay (URA compliant)
The humble abode maintains its historic British Colonial flavour with its cool green exterior, while holding true to a classic elegance throughout its interior. The impeccably clean and spacious room features a super-single bed, a work table, fresh linens, towels, spare toiletries, all fully provided for. Also stocked with all the cookware, dishware, kitchen towels, and condiments, our kitchen is ready for you to whip up budget friendly meals when you are not out enjoying our fine local restaurants. Fully equipped with Optic Fibre Internet, work and play has never been made this easy!

A luxury three-bedroom located in West side of Singapore, the place is an apt choice for family or corporate with utmost design and comfort. A close option to National University Singapore and NUH along with a few minutes away to nearest bus stop.

The space
Spread into a massive space of 1283 sq.ft., with room for up to 6, our spacious three-bedroom apartments are perfect for couples travelling with kids or bigger families. Fully furnished with a kitchen, cable TV and Wi-Fi, you’ll have everything you need for a modern, suburban living experience in one of Singapore’s heartlands.

• 3 times/week housekeeping service (except Sundays and Public Holidays)
• Complimentary local phone calls
• Complimentary selected SCV cable TV programs
• Complimentary utilities
• Complimentary usage of wireless broadband internet


Living / Dining Area
• Sofa
• 42" LCD TV
• Stereo system
• Cable TV channels
• DVD

name: Serviced apartment in Singapore · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Our Studio Premier Apartments are designed and furnished for your comfort and enjoyment in mind. With 2 designer chairs by the high window, gaze over the city with bright lights and shed away your inhibitions. The king sized bed with feather mattress topper provides extra warmth and inspire a luxurious sleeping experience that leaves you feeling refreshed and invigorated.

3 - 5 minutes walk to Bras Basah, Cityhall & Bugis MRT. Esplanade, MBS and major attractions are within walking distance.

The space
Spanning 400 sqft, our Studio Premier apartment is the perfect accommodation for short- or long-term travellers.

Located in the city centre offering irresistible view of Singapore, each apartment has a king-sized bed, fully-equipped kitchen and washing machine.

Here's a list of of things we provide to our guest/s:
- Elevator on every floor
· Bedroom 1: King bed

name: Hostel in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 4 beds · 3 shared baths
description:
The creative spatial manipulation in MET A Space Pod @ Arab Street is the perfect example of why our location, Arab Street, is known for its eclectic mix of new and old-school charms.

To access Singapore's major attractions, simply head to Bugis's Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) station which is merely 6mins away by foot and Bugis Village as well as Bugis Street is less than 3mins away from the MRT Station.

name: Condo in Singapore · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 shared baths
Serviced apartment in Singapore · ★4.85 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Our apartment is modern, comfortable and spacious studio service apartments located in the mixed development building at Outram Park. The studio service apartments are only - a few minutes drive to Tanjong Pagar and Chinatown; 10 minutes drive to Sentosa Island and Orchard Road -12 minutes drive to the business financial district such as Marina Bay Financial Central and Suntec Towers. - walking distance to the Singapore General Hospital (SGH).

Other things to note
Toilet paper, bath and shampoo will only provided 1 set during check-in no matter how many weeks/ months stay.

name: Boutique hotel in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 4 beds · 1.5 baths
description:
K2 Guesthouse is situated near NUS/NUH & Buona Vista. The nearest MRT is Haw Par Villa, a 15 mins walk from the Hotel. All rooms are beautifully furnished with complete clean linens and a clean attached bathroom. Coffee, water, and Tea are provided.

There’s a shared lobby pantry area for sitting and mingling after work, it's a nice outdoor area for a beer after the hot weather cools off!

Please Note: Complimentary Breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM - 10:AM.

The space
There is a patio/gazebo where guests can relax, eat and have a drink. Right across us there is a supermarket, asian food and bars.

Guest access
Guest’s are permitted to access these places outside their room:
- Common kitchen at the first floor lobby
- Outdoor gazebos at the first floor lobby
- Hallway / Corridor

Anywhere else is strictly not allowed and will be considered as trespassing.

Other things to note

name: Boutique hotel in Singapore · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1.5 shared baths
description:
Featuring a modern chic décor, the Suite with Outdoor Tub is fitted with a timeless artwork that inspires a bespoke boutique hotel feel, STC 45-rated acoustic walls, air-conditioning, a queen-sized bed with comfy, quality linens, a personalised IPTV system, and convenient touch points. The bathroom comes with a rain shower and high-end German sanitaryware. Includes a gorgeous outdoor tub that is perfect for lazy afternoon with spritzers, and romantic nights with wine.

The space
Hotel Soloha’s Suite with Outdoor Tub features a great spacious space for a quick getaway right smack in the middle of the lion city. Large mirrors inside the room for the 'gram, and even a luxurious outdoor tub which you can soak your time away.

Guest access
Guests will be able to access the lobby, 5 foot way, F&B area, Games/Meeting Room, and the Courtyard.

description:
thelittlegreyroom is a cosy place created for budget travellers and families looking for a no frills accommodation. The space

- Fridge

Spread into a massive space of 1283 sqft, this 3 bedroom apartment is a great choice for those travelling with families and small groups. Once you enter the apartment, you will be greeted by the living room and the dining area.

name: Condo in Singapore · ★5.0 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
description:
Das Zimmer befindet sich in einer Wohnanlage und bietet neben einem Super-Single Bett ein weiteres Ausziehbett mit normaler Matratze, Klimaanlage, WC mit Dusche, Ablagemöglichkeiten und einen kleinen Schreibtisch.
Die Anlage hat einen Fitnessraum, mehrere Pools (Whirlpool), Tennisplätze, Squash, Badminton und Mulitfunktionscourt für die kostenlose Nutzung.

The space
Die MRT (Downtown Linie) ist ca. 6 min zu Fuß entfernt, Busse sind in 4 min durch den Seiteneingang erreichbar. Die nächste Mall (Hillion Mall) kann man mit der MRT (eine Haltestelle entfernt) oder zu Fuß in 10 min erreichen.
In der Wohnanlage befindet sich ein Mini Markt und ein Friseur. Die Anlage ist rund um die Uhr (in Singapur üblich) durch Sicherheitspersonal abgesichert.

During your stay
Im Allgemeinen bin ich rund um die Uhr erreichbar.

This two-bedroom, two-bathroom unit has a light and airy feel to it that lends well to its minimalist atmosphere. Panoramic city views from the huge unit windows and balcony are amazing and add to the liveability of this property. The alcove pantry kitchen with its adjacent dining area flow well into the living area for open-plan living. Fully furnished and equipped, this unit is ready to move in and start enjoying. This spacious unit is perfect for a family or if you require a guest room.

The space
The apartment comes with living area, open concept kitchen, one bedroom with comfortable queen size bed, another common bedroom,en-suite bathroom, a balcony, and a wardrobe.

The apartment comes fully furnished including the following amenities:
- Complimentary Wifi
- Queen Size Bed
- Sofa
- Air-conditioning
- Curtain
- Microwave
- Stove
- Electric Kettle
- Refrigerator (with Freezer)
- TV
- Shower Ameni

name: Townhouse in Singapore · ★4.67 · 1 bedroom · 4 beds · 2.5 shared baths
description:
Clean private rooms in a townhouse near City center, 2-3 mins walk from Ferrar Park MRT station. Great place for shopping and site seeing, 5 mins walk City Square mall, 24hrs Mustafa shopping center, Farrer Park hospital, Little India market, Hindu & Buddhist temples. Local food/ coffee shops, restaurants, modern cafes, traditional shops are at the door step.

The space
Private rooms (with door key lock) in the Shared apartment, solely meant for guests' use. Room has built in closets, mini fridge, TV, Air Condition, Wi-Fi and 2 bunk bed that can accommodate 4 people.

description:

description:
This listing is for an entire apartment on the second floor of an original and quaint 3-storey walk up apartment block in a quiet and peaceful neighbourhood in the Central East region of Singapore, 5 minutes walk to the Paya Lebar MRT, and 6 MRT stops from Changi Airport. name: Home in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
description:
Private room in a corner terrace house
- Wardrobe, dresser, bookshelf
- Study table upon request
- Single bed with a pull-out mattress

Pool, attic, garden available for use!!

The space
We have a nice lap pool which we barely use. There are also several outdoor garden spaces, and you may even have a barbecue (upon request)! Our house has an attic and roof access, so you can enjoy watching the sunset / sunrise if you feel like it.

Guest access
Laundry can be covered by us upon request.

We have several shared spaces (living room, dining area, attic, 2 gardens, pool) which are free to use.

During your stay
We would love to interact with our guests - but will do so at your pace. I am always available through text, and you can call me if there is anything urgent. Happy to show you around the neighbourhood / guide you around the house to familiarise yourself with the environment.

name: Hotel in Singapore · Studio · 1 shared bath
description:
Located at the start of the ethnic enclave of Little India, an intersection point of contemporary living and 19th century heritage. The curated mix of retail, dining, fitness and cultural options spread across four floors. By walking distance is the arts, heritage and design precinct of Bugis and Bras Basah. From here, it is easy to travel to other locations within the country, especially the Central Business District, thanks to the close proximity of Rochor and Little India MRT Stations.

name: Boutique hotel in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 1.5 baths
description:
D’Hotel is set in the midst of Tiong Bahru, a historic neighbourhood that was built in the 1930s. In recent years, it has undergone gentrification, resulting in the opening of a slew of chic cafes, art galleries and stores with easy access to Tiong Bahru, Outram Park and Chinatown MRT Stations in the vicinity.
D’Hotel offers 41 well-appointed rooms which are spacious, stylish and punctuated with bursts of floral and nature-inspired artwork.

享受都市生活和无与伦比的便利住在悠邸服务式公寓. 位于新加坡市中心，我们的服务式公寓适合短期和长期住宿. 购物商场，超级市场, 星加坡优美景点在步行距离之内. 百胜和武吉士和政府大厦地铁站介于三到五分钟行走.

Enjoy the urban life and unparalleled convenience of staying at our Serviced Apartments. Located in the heart of Singapore, our apartments are suitable for short-term and long-term stays. -婴儿床和床单（视情况而定）

name: Serviced apartment in Singapore · 2 bedrooms · 2 beds · 2 baths
description:
This luxuriously built 2 bedroom apartment is situated close to the famous Chinese Garden. Just a minute away from MRT stop and plenty of bus routes offer a swift, relaxing ride to Jurong’s shopping district. Furnished space comes with a private balcony and all home appliances, apt for families and corporates.

The space
Your 2 bedroom apartment is situated on the 6th level and it is equipped with a balcony , 2 bedrooms as well as 2 bathrooms with a washer dryer.

This fully furnished apartment is equipped with services included in the rental like unlimited wifi internet, TV channels, dedicated customer support and much more.

There is a fully equipped kitchen for you to cook fresh and delicious meals for your loved ones.

You can use the swimming pool, sky gymnasium, BBQ, Sky garden, Tennis court, aqua gym, an exercise studio, cardio park as well as a reflexology garden, Italian cut bar, an Alfresco cookout as well as a dining lawn.

The apartment is fully furnished, air conditioned and comes with a well equipped kitchen sufficient for your stay. A bustling residential neighbourhood full of convenient amenities, there are markets, food centres and many service providers around. The apartment comes with a spacious living/sleeping area, an open concept kitchen, comfortable queen size bed, en-suite bathroom, balcony and wardrobe.

The apartment comes fully furnished including the following amenities:

name: Serviced apartment in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
Located at the junction of Sims Drive and Aljunied Road, this beautiful and homey feel 1-bedroom apartment represents the best in city-edge living. Three statuesque structures extend skyward, offering a priceless panorama of Singapore’s skyline. Just a 5-mins walk to Aljunied MRT station makes the travel style easy for the residents.

The space
Spread into 52square meters in area, these fully furnished apartments feature a fully equipped kitchen, a washer/dryer, air-conditioning with individual thermostat control, complimentary TV channels, cooker, microwave oven, electric kettle and all home appliances.

name: Serviced apartment in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 bath
description:
享受都市生活和无与伦比的便利住在悠邸服务式公寓. 位于新加坡市中心，我们的服务式公寓适合短期和长期住宿. 购物商场，超级市场, 新加坡优美景点在步行距离之内. 百胜和武吉士和政府大厦地铁站介于三到五分钟行走.

Enjoy the urban life and unparalleled convenience of staying at our Serviced Apartments. Located in the heart of Singapore, our apartments are suitable for short-term and long-term stays. Shopping malls, supermarkets, major attractions in Singapore are within walking distance. Bras Basah and Bugis and City Hall MRT station is between three to five minutes walk away.

The space
面积为280平方英尺，我们的服务式公寓是短期或长期旅行者的理想住宿。位于市中心，享有新加坡无敌美景，设有一张雙人床，设备齐全的厨房和洗衣机。

以下我们提供给客人的物品清单:
-每层楼的电梯
·卧室1：雙人床
-新鲜的毛巾 / 家政服务
-空调 / 维修服务
⁃液晶电视+有线频道+ WIFI +高速局域网
- 设备齐全的小厨房，配有现代电器，例如冰箱，微波炉，洗衣机和烘干机，水壶，炊具，全套晚餐等
- 带浴缸和淋浴的浴室
- 提供毛巾，卫生纸，肥皂，洗手液和吹风机
-熨斗和烫衣板
-婴儿床和床单（视情况而定）

注意：您的健康是我们的重中之重。

name: Hotel in Singapore · Studio · 1 bed · 1 private bath
description:
Be culturally charmed as you live in the melting pot of Arab, Peranakan and Indian cultures. Go on a shopping spree at nearby shopping malls or let yourself be captivated by the boutique outlets stocked with unique fashion labels as you explore the side streets of Kampong Glam, Bugis Village and Haji Lane. Being close to the heart of the city centre, the hotel offers views of the city’s skyscrapers and Singapore Flyer. With so much to explore, you will never have a dull moment during your stay.

The space

32-inch LED TV with cable channels
Complimentary Wi-Fi

Mini-refrigerator

Commuters can get to the CBD from apartment in 25 minutes. By car, it is 5 minutes to Orchard Road, and 10 minutes into town, depending on traffic.

name: Hotel in Singapore · ★4.67 · Studio · 1 bed · 1 private bath
description:
Be culturally charmed as you live in the melting pot of Arab, Peranakan and Indian cultures. Go on a shopping spree at nearby shopping malls or let yourself be captivated by the boutique outlets stocked with unique fashion labels as you explore the side streets of Kampong Glam, Bugis Village and Haji Lane. Being close to the heart of the city centre, the hotel offers views of the city’s skyscrapers and Singapore Flyer. With so much to explore, you will never have a dull moment during your stay.

Other things to note
Inspired by the colourful personality of its neighbourhood, each Village encounter is like no other. Step into any Village property and experience the locale's unique charm. Once outside, let Village be your guide as you soak in the sights and sounds of our vibrant precincts.
Be sure to download a copy of the Village Passport upon check-in, a specially curated walking guide to help you Eat, Play and Explore like a Local.

name: Villa in Singapore · 4 bedrooms · 4 beds · 5.5 baths
description:
This stylish resort standalone house furnished to the highest standard, is perfect for a family or group trips. Situated in a cul de sac adjacent to a nature reserve and full of greenery and mature plants. Nearest MRT rapid train is 10min walk. Close to a large supermarket and plenty of eateries- local hawkers and restaurants, all within walking distance.

Spacious house with 4800sf of indoor living space, is right in the heart of nature. Cool, airy, bright with relaxing garden, outdoor patio and pool. Basement gym available to use.

Guest access
No access to bedroom 5(not pictured) and storeroom. One bedroom will be locked for owner’s personal belongings. Room 6 which is a Basement gym is available to use.

Other things to note

description:
A creative walk up apartment located in the hip and vibrant heritage neighbourhood, Joo Chiat.

Just above the cool cafes and hip shops, in the east side of Singapore.

Literally on Joo Chiat Rd. It’s one of the hippest neighbourhoods in Singapore, with plenty of cafes, Vietnamese banh mi shops, local kaya toast coffee shops, record stores, bohemian retail shops

2 min walk away from east coast road

Plenty of gyms and yoga, Muay Thai studios nearby

name: Hotel in Singapore · ★4.85 · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath
description:
新加坡金沙酒店（Marina Bay Sands ）因壮观的空中无边泳池和绝美的空中花园而闻名世界，是世上最昂贵酒店，也是新加坡最大的酒店。这座酒店堪称有史以来设计最为复杂的酒店，不仅涵盖了多种业态，而且拥有多项世界之最以及新加坡最与众不同的城市观景方式。无数游客来到这里，在享受奢华与尊贵的酒店服务之外，都会前往空中观景台一览新加坡的天际线，从另一角度感受不一样的狮城美景。对于喜爱购物和美食的游客来说，这里更有无数的精品店铺和全球获奖的餐厅，带给人们非凡的假日享受。
　　金沙酒店位于海湾舫道10号，由三座连成一串的酒店大楼组成，顶部建有空中花园。滨海湾金沙®，纵享奢华的绝佳目的地。这座综合度假胜地由三栋楼高 55 层的酒店塔楼组成，内设精致客房与附私人管家服务的豪华套房，彻底改造了新加坡天际线。金沙空中花园 (Sands SkyPark®) 雄冠三塔之巅，令建筑完美无缺。

入佳滨海湾金沙酒店，享受房间的美景和完善的设施，包括著名的无限屋顶游泳池，我们提供各种房问类型，如豪华，豪华，俱乐部，套房等，价格实惠，具有竞争力。
这是基本房型“豪华房”的价格。如需其他房型，请寄信给我们查询。

Other things to note
关于入住酒店的任何问题 、都跟我联系

name: Hotel in Singapore · Studio · 1 bed · 1 shared bath
description:
Conveniently located just minutes away from the bright lights of Little India and the culture-rich Straits Chinese enclave of Bugis, Village Hotel Albert Court effortlessly straddles the best of both
worlds. While a walk around the compound will uncover traditional Indian and Peranakan carvings and motifs on the walls, a peek into any room will reveal modern facilities catered to both business and leisure travellers.

Guest access
The lobby lounge is open daily for you to catch up after work in a relaxed venue over cocktails, beverages and light snacks.

name: Hotel in Singapore · 1 bedroom · 1 bed · 1 private bath

新加坡 滨海湾金沙酒店（Marina Bay Sands）号称当今世上最昂贵酒店，当天，这个耗资40亿英镑打造、拥有室外泳池、观光平台、豪华赌场 等高档 设施的 度假酒店 正式对宾客开放，最令人叫绝的是，宾客们可以在游泳的同时，俯瞰新加坡的 城市景观 。世界上最昂贵的酒店这个室外泳池建在滨海湾金沙酒店57层高的塔楼顶层，是 奥运会 泳池长度的三倍，高度为650英尺（198米），是这一高度下世界上最大的室外泳池。

description:
Live aboard our beautiful sailboat, where you can experience the serene and stunning Sentosa Island in Singapore like never before. Our sailboat offers a unique and unforgettable stay.

Our sailboat is berthed in a prime location, just a short walk away from some of Sentosa's best attractions, restaurants, and beach options. Whether you're a solo traveler, a couple, or a small family, our sailboat is the perfect accommodation for a unique and memorable stay in Sentosa Island.

The space

name: Serviced apartment in Singapore · ★4.13 · 2 bedrooms · 3 beds · 1 bath
description:
Geylang still reigns as a popular buzzing food haven in Singapore, especially after the sun sets 夜宵美食. 24/7 Sheng Siong supermarket 超市 is just across the road. The 网红田鸡粥famous frog porridge restaurants are within 5min walking distance with plenty of others out there till late. Numerous durian stalls along the street 猫山王, enjoy a freshly picked MSW durian from Malaysia known as the King fruit.

Kallang MRT Station 加冷地铁站 is merely a bus stop away, easy to travel to many attraction spots 出行方便!

The space
Geylang is a neighborhood located in the eastern part of Singapore, known for its vibrant and bustling atmosphere, especially at night. It is a popular destination for tourists who are looking to experience Singapore's local culture, food, and entertainment.
